subject: Olympic Games
Diving (Sports Event)
Advertising and Marketing
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
Cereals
lead_paragraph: A petition drive on Change.org is calling for General Mills to feature the diver Greg Louganis, quite possibly the greatest ever at his sport, on the Wheaties cereal box.
snippet: A petition drive on Change.org is calling for General Mills to feature the diver Greg Louganis, quite possibly the greatest ever at his sport, on the Wheaties cereal box.
